biography.value: A giant vulture has advanced intelligence and a malevolent bent. Unlike its smaller kin, it will attack a wounded creature to hasten its end. Giant vultures have been known to haunt a thirsty, starving creature for days to enjoy its suffering.

languages.custom: Understands Common but can't speak  it

description.value:
The vulture makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d4 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Keen Sight and Smell. The vulture has advantage on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Pack Tactics. The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
